param.name: zendesk.host
param.desc: Zendesk host where to upload the aticles.

param.name: zendesk.token
param.desc: Zendesk API Token used for authentication.

param.name: zendesk.category.name
param.desc: The category in which to upload the articles. Categories are the top-level organizing containers of the help center. Categories contain sections.

param.name: zendesk.section.name
param.desc: The section in which to upload the articles. Sections contain related articles. When publishing to a subsection, a path of section names separated by '///' can be passed, for example: 'Main section///Subsection 1///Subsection 1.1'.

param.name: zendesk.create.drafts
param.desc: When you create a draft article, it is saved but not published, so that you can continue working on it until it's ready to publish.

param.name: zendesk.permission.group.name
param.desc: Zendesk permission group that controls who edits and publishes articles.

param.name: zendesk.visible.to
param.desc: Zendesk user segment to which the articles are visible.

param.name: zendesk.create.toc
param.desc: Publish the table of contents of the publication as an initial article.

param.name: zendesk.toc.title.prefix
param.desc: Prefix to use for the title of the table of contents article.

param.name: zendesk.toc.title.suffix
param.desc: Suffix to use for the title of the table of contents article.
